text: Frank Capcino (February 7, 1929 - June 8, 2015), better known by his ring name Frank Cappuccino, was an American boxing referee. He was best for officiating the Mike Tyson and Michael Spinks fight on June 27, 1988 in Atlantic City, New Jersey. He played a referee in the movie Rocky V (1990). He was born in Philadelphia, Pennsylvania. Cappuccino died from Alzheimer's disease on June 8, 2015 in Yardley, Pennsylvania, aged 86. ==References== Category:1929 births Category:2015 deaths Category:American boxers Category:Deaths from Alzheimer's disease Category:Disease-related deaths in Pennsylvania Category:American referees Category:Sportspeople from Philadelphia
title: Frank Cappuccino
